content:
In the FlexCard Designer, you can get data from various sources and view the returned data JSON. Configure your FlexCard's datasource in the Setup panel. Get data directly from Salesforce with Omnistudio Data Mappers, SOQL Query, and SOSL Search, or from external sources with Rest Web. For complex business processes, use Apex Remote and Integration Procedures.

View the returned data by clicking Save & Fetch or in the Data JSON panel in Preview. Display data with elements such as a datatable, chart, image, field, child FlexCard, and Custom LWC. Use data merge fields to display data based on JSON nodes.

Configure a Child FlexCard's data source independently of its parent FlexCard, or use the parent's data source. Enable FlexCard element properties to access data JSON using merge fields. Merge fields reference JSON node values and require syntax such as {FirstName}.
title: Working with Data in FlexCards
